data.label: #date.yyyy-MM-dd#
data.content: #date.yyyy-MM-dd#

<script>
$(document).ready(function () {
    const durations = {
        "BBQ Pit": 4,
        "Multipurpose Hall": 6,
        "Meeting Room": 3,
        "Sauna": 1,
        "Pickleball Court": 2
    };

    function getHour(dateTimeStr) {
        const d = new Date(dateTimeStr);
        return d.getHours();
    }

    function pad(n) {
        return n < 10 ? "0" + n : n;
    }

    function addHours(dateTimeStr, hours) {
        const d = new Date(dateTimeStr);
        d.setHours(d.getHours() + hours);
        return pad(d.getHours()) + ":" + pad(d.getMinutes());
    }

    // Force user to choose hour only (no minutes)
    $("#dateAndTime").on("change", function () {
        let raw = $(this).val();
        if (!raw) return;

        let date = new Date(raw);
        let h = date.getHours();

        if (h < 10 || h > 21) {
            alert("Time must be between 10:00 AM and 9:00 PM.");
            $(this).val('');
            $("#auto_end_display").html("");
            return;
        }

        // Force minutes = 00
        date.setMinutes(0);
        let iso = date.toISOString().slice(0, 16);
        $(this).val(iso); // format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm

        const facility = $("#facilityName").val();
        if (facility && durations[facility]) {
            const end = addHours(date, durations[facility]);
            $("#auto_end_display").html("End Time: " + end);
        }
    });

    // Recalculate when facility changes
    $("#facilityName").on("change", function () {
        $("#dateAndTime").trigger("change");
    });
});
</script>
